title: Foundations of Nursing Research, 6E Nieswiadomy [PDF][StormRG]
description:
TITLE/EDITION Foundations in Nursing Research (6th Edition)
By: Rose Marie Nieswiadomy 
Series: Nieswiadomy, Foundations of Nursing Research
Paperback: 352 pages
Publisher: Prentice Hall; 6 edition (February 28, 2011)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 0132118572
ISBN-13: 978-0132118576
NOTE: This is the standalone ebook and may not include access codes that come packaged with the bound book

_____________________________________________________________________________________


FOUNDATIONS IN NURSING RESEARCH, 6/e, an engaging, learner-friendly text, illuminates all steps of the nursing research process, helping students critique research and determine whether study findings are ready to apply in practice. To illustrate specific aspects of the research process, the author extensively excerpts from published studies, including research performed outside the U.S. Pedagogical features include chapter outlines, objectives, definitions of key terms, summaries, class activities, and self-tests. This Sixth Edition has been revised with up-to-date information and references throughout; more coverage of both quantitative and qualitative research; greater focus on evidence-based practice; and an all-new chapter on nursing research and health care economics
